corporate_sponsors.name: Intel
corporate_sponsors.tagline: Intel: pushing the limits of computing every day.
corporate_sponsors.blurb:
Think you know Intel? Think again.

Every day, Intel employees push the limits of computing with one guiding principle: to enrich the lives of every person on Earth through technology. This is our commitment. It is what makes us unique. Learn more about Intel.

corporate_sponsors.name: Igloo
corporate_sponsors.tagline: Igloo is an intranet you'll actually like.
corporate_sponsors.blurb:
Igloo is an intranet you'll actually like.

Communicate and collaborate better using Igloo's built-in apps: blogs, calendars, file sharing, forums, microblogs, tasks and wikis. Start with an app or build your custom intranet solution.

corporate_sponsors.name: AdBlock
corporate_sponsors.tagline: You won't know what you're glad you're missing.
corporate_sponsors.blurb:
With AdBlock, most ads aren't even downloaded at all. So you can focus on enjoying the content you want, and spend less time waiting for it.

Get AdBlock Now!

corporate_sponsors.name: Moxtra
corporate_sponsors.tagline: Moxtra is a mobile first cloud platform and app for team communication and collaboration.
corporate_sponsors.blurb:
Moxtra is a mobile first cloud platform and app for team communication and collaboration.

Moxtra's SDK makes it simple to provide real-time collaboration right within your iOS, Android, or web app. Your users can message you and each other, share images, audio, and video, meet, and share the screens of their mobile devices—all in real-time. Use Moxtra to build a community around your product.
